messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion]  Sheila----Hello, New and  confused.......
messages.msgSnippet: ... Her name is Stacia (a, not e) Tauscher. Other than that, I couldn t find her - unless she s the Canadian woman who was giving her husband the bumps in
messages.messageBody:
>I don't know who she is,
>We worry about what a child will be tomorrow, yet we forget that he
>is someone today.
>Stacie Tauscher


Her name is Stacia (a, not e) Tauscher.
Other than that, I couldn't find her - unless she's the Canadian woman who
was 'giving her husband the 'bumps'' in bed on 9/11. (From a
where-were-you-when website.)

The quote is everywhere it seems, but nothing more on her.
Maybe someone else is more talented than I at finding out about folks.
HeidiWD


Get all the fools on your side and you can be elected to anything. - Frank Dane

messages.subject: Re: Stacia Tauscher quote
messages.msgSnippet: The quote came from Stacia, not Stacie.  She doesn t say whether she was the author or not.  Here is her web page. http://www.cyber-
messages.messageBody:
The quote came from Stacia, not Stacie. She doesn't say whether she
was the author or not. Here is her web page.

http://www.cyber-
nation.com/victory/quotations/authors/quotes_tauscher_stacia.html

Crystal


--- Onesnotenough@a... wrote:
> I don't know who she is, I found the quote on another Unschool list
and asked
> if I could use it. I should of asked where it came from!
> syndi
>
> We worry about what a child will be tomorrow, yet we forget that he
> is someone today.
> Stacie Tauscher

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Sheila----Hello, New and confused.......
messages.msgSnippet: I don t know who she is, I found the quote on another Unschool list and asked if I could use it.  I should of asked where it came from! syndi We worry about
messages.messageBody:
I don't know who she is, I found the quote on another Unschool list and asked
if I could use it. I should of asked where it came from!
syndi

We worry about what a child will be tomorrow, yet we forget that he
is someone today.
Stacie Tauscher


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
